title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Welcome to the website of the RuhrMetrics reading group! The objective of the reading group is to create a place of exchange for all econometrics enthusiasts. We intend to read papers that appeal to the average econometric practitioner. Our goal is to read papers that are groundbreaking and seminal in the field, be it the classic GAMLSS paper from Rigby & Stasinopoulos (2005) or a recent contribution such as the Matrix Autoregressive models by Chen et al. (2020).
Before each semester we kindly ask new participants to suggest papers for the group. Then the selection of papers are “curated” and assigned to possible dates of the reading group. For each session we select a paper that should be read beforehand. Then, in the session the person that suggested the paper gives 20 min presentation with the key insights from the paper. Discussion takes place either during or after the presentation. Altogether the meeting lasts 60min. Afterwards, we have the tradition to go out for dinner altogether were the discussion takes new directions into either socializing with new people or into new research topics.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Next Sessions
Thank you all participants from the last semester. Please take a look at the tab above in order to express your interest for the upcoming semester.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Location
All meetings (for the time being) will be held in the University of Essen in room R12 R06 A48.






 For those not familiar with the numbering system, R12 is the entrance number to the red building, R06 means to take the red elevator to the sixth floor and A48 is room 48 in hallway A.

title: RuhrMetrics Reading Group
text:
Contacts
If you have any question, you can contact either Christian or Ignacio.

Christian Schulz
Ignacio Moreira Lara
